subject: Football
Stadiums and Arenas
lead_paragraph: Jerry Jones, the owner of the Dallas Cowboys, spent $1.12 billion on a new home for his team, one that shouts media and screams that the future is here for the 'Boys.
snippet: Jerry Jones, the owner of the Dallas Cowboys, spent $1.12 billion on a new home for his team, one that shouts media and screams that the future is here for the 'Boys.
